name: ace_physical_biogeochemical_oceanography_underway
title: Physical and biogeochemical oceanography data from underway measurements with an AquaLine Ferrybox during the Antarctic Circumnavigation Expedition (ACE).
x_spi_citation: Haumann, F. A., Robinson, C., Thomas, J., Hutchings, J., Pina Estany, C., Tarasenko, A., Gerber, F., and Leonard, K. (2020): Physical and biogeochemical oceanography data from underway measurements with an Aqualine Ferrybox during the Antarctic Circumnavigation Expedition (ACE). (Version 1.0) [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3660852.
